column17:
Panasonic has come up with this electric cooker for those who can't afford to spend time in cooking. It has an automatic cooking and warming function with indicator lights. It comes with a strong durable body and a capacity of 2.2 litres. It also features an anodized aluminum cooking pan with scoop holder.
